A wristwatch that doubles as a virtual assistant: The watch could have a built-in AI assistant that canise voice commands, set reminders, send messages, and even control smart home devices. It could also have a touch screen interface for easy navigation.

A wristwatch with a customizable display: The watch could have a customizable display that can show different watch faces, widgets, and even animations. Users could also create their own watch faces using a mobile app.
